Class KMVAttackInflationFromFile

  • java.lang.Object
    • KMVAttackInflationFromFile

  • public class KMVAttackInflationFromFile
extends java.lang.Object
    Sanity check class for the inflation attack included in the paper On the Security of K Minimum Value (KMV) Sketches: Vulnerabilities and Protection P. Reviriego, A. Sánchez-Macián, S. Liu, F. Lombardi
    Author:
    Alfonso Sánchez-Macián

      Read the Attack set from a file.
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
      Reads the Attack sets from specific files, load them to sketches and check that they provide the expected overestimation similar to the expected cardinality
      private static double[] validateSet(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Double> aAttack, org.apache.datasketches.theta.UpdateSketchBuilder builder)
      Insert all the elements from the Attack set into an empty sketch and then calculates the estimation and the number of retained entries in the sketch.

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Reads the Attack sets from specific files, load them to sketches and check that they provide the expected overestimation similar to the expected cardinality
        Parameters:
        args - Command line arguments (ignored)

      • buildFromFile

        private static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Double> buildFromFile(java.lang.String filename)
        Read the Attack set from a file. Elements are expected to be double values.
        Parameters:
        filename - Name of the file to be read
        Returns:
        The attack set as an ArrayList of Doubles

      • validateSet

        private static double[] validateSet(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Double> aAttack,
                                    org.apache.datasketches.theta.UpdateSketchBuilder builder)
        Insert all the elements from the Attack set into an empty sketch and then calculates the estimation and the number of retained entries in the sketch.
        Parameters:
        aAttack - Attack set as an ArrayList
        builder - Configured element in charge of building the sketch
        Returns:
        two double values corresponding to the estimate and the number of retained entries at the end of the loading process.
